overview: Kevin Burkitt is the Chief Technology Officer of Boxfish. As CTO of boxfish, Kevin is responsible for building some really big cool stuff that has never been done before. Prior to Boxfish, Kevin’s professional career began with voice recognition platform development, during his time as CTO of Red Circle he designed and led the development of a highly scalable, direct to consumer platform encompassing voice / mobile and web technologies. Through its proprietary analytics engine, this platform drove massive customer acquisition, ultimately leading to the sale of the business in 2008. He now builds new internets.
